name: Steve Macdonald
description:
'''Steve Macdonald''' is an American [[filk music|filk]] singer/songwriter, who also appears at [[Renaissance Fair]]es as "Gallamor the Bard". He served for several years as the [[Pegasus Award]] Evangelista, and was responsible for many changes in the award process that led to much greater participation among the voting base. He was inducted into the Filk Hall of Fame in 2006.

In September 2006 he emigrated to [[Germany]].
